title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 30.3 - License requirement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 30.3 - License requirement

State Regulations

After July 1, 1978, no person shall operate or cause to be
operated a major facility without a license issued by the department pursuant
to this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
30.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
